pages.text: This is probably the most complex page type in the mod. It's an iteration on the default 'crafting' page type, but with a lot more features. It allows you to freely display crafting recipes and texts with and without titles on the page.

pages.text2: You can mix and match crafting recipes and text boxes on the same page. This allows you to have a lot of flexibility in how you present information to the player.

pages.text: The text features are the same as for the 'text+' page type, this is why the text render at the top of the page. I didn't define a title for this text box, so the start of the text renderer gets moved to the top of the page.
pages.title2: Why use the 'text+' page type at all?
pages.text2: That's totally up to you. You don't always need to display crafting recipes on a 'crafting+' page. 2 texts are fine as well. Fun Fact: this page is a 'crafting+' page.

pages.title: More Explanation
pages.text: Everything is dynamic, that means if you don't want an aspect of the page to be displayed, you can simply don't define it and it won't be rendered.
